bibl.title: A Fragment of Homer, Iliad 21 in the Newberry Library, Chicago. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: May derive from the Goodspeed collection. Iliad 21, 567-581. Arsinoite nome?, 2nd-1st cent. BCE. The verso features two columns of an account of money.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Chicago Newberry Libr. Inv. Greek Ms. 1 (ORMS 55) recto
TORALLAS TOVAR Sofía and Klaas A. WORP, A Fragment of Homer, Iliad 21 in the Newberry Library, Chicago. Avec résumé en anglais.
May derive from the Goodspeed collection. Iliad 21, 567-581. Arsinoite nome?, 2nd-1st cent. BCE. The verso features two columns of an account of money.
